update orderinfo a inner join (select id from orderinfo where status=1 or status=0 and lastlandingtime not between TIMESTAMPADD(MINUTE, -9, SYSDATE()) and TIMESTAMPADD(MINUTE, 0, SYSDATE())) b set a.status=3
